lang.title: About me.
first_block: Hi there! My name is Edson Marcelo and I am a Frontend Developer.

I have always been passionate about the internet itself, games and staff and back in 2020 i started to learn programming on my own and I have been actively seeking to improve myself for almost 2 years now.
My language of choice is Javascript. I use it mostly with React.js and Next.js.
second_block: I'm currently working as a Frontend developer in a company based in Rio de Janeiro, where I'm responsible for the development of different kinds of softwares.

Here i had the opportunitie to work in some features in a pizza callcenter app, develop an application to control all the flux from a school, from the parents registering their kids and paying their annuities to the school administration listing its filials, segments they work with, prices to be paid, etc..
The app I'm currently working on is a NFT marketplace for a blockchain game that will be released soon.
third_block: In my free time, you can find me playing games or watching sci-fi movies.
My favorite game being Tibia (which is also a bone).
And my favorite movie of all times: Interstellar.
